subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Giro d''Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong continues to insist he will ride in the Giro d'Italia, but with a fractured right collarbone mended with a stainless steel plate and 12 screws, the mountainous race seems an impossible trek.
snippet: Lance Armstrong continues to insist he will ride in the Giro d'Italia, but with a fractured right collarbone mended with a stainless steel plate and 12 screws, the mountainous race seems an impossible trek.
